title: A proclamacion, set furth by the kynges Maiestye with thassent of his derest vncle, Edward Duke of Somerset, gouernour of his moste royall persone, and of his realmes, dominions and subiectes protector, and others of his most honorable counsayle for the executyng of a lawe martiall for payne of death against rebellors and their vpstyrrors
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1547-1553 : Edward VI)
